Trending Internet Offer

World's First Adjustable Eyeglasses: Upgrade Your Vision Instantly

 4.5/5
  • by
  • Oliver Shannon
  • Dec 06, 2020
  • Personal Care
1.2k
405
835
741

Imagine being able to make your eyes zoom in and zoom out like robots do in sci-fi movies. 

What if I told you that you can also have “bionic eyes” and control your vision instantly? Crystal clear, adjustable vision can be your superpower!

Chances are that if you are over 40, you probably have presbyopia (blurry vision when reading a book or looking at your smartphone), myopia (blurry vision when driving or watching the TV) or both combined.

In that case, you have to switch between two different pairs of eyeglasses and not be able to use your smartphone and watch the TV at the same time!

And if you choose multifocal eyeglasses (suitable for both myopia and presbyopia), you’ll have to spend about $700-1200 just for a pair of glasses!

Not to mention that many of us have to change eyeglasses twice a year just because our prescription changes. Let alone all these visits to the optometrist that are not very cheap either.

To put it simple, many of us struggle with our eyesight. Until now, we had very few options and none of them was affordable. Not anymore.

Meet ProperFocus™, the world’s first flexible pair of eyeglasses that can be adjusted instantly to your needs!

ProperFocus™ - The future of glasses

ProperFocus is a state-of-art pair of eyeglasses that comes with flexible temples. This way, you can adjust them on your face and the unique shape of your face and nose.

But most importantly, ProperFocus uses Dual Vision Technology (DVL) that enables you to adjust your sight with a turn of a dial.

To put it simple, you can manually adjust the lenses and use them for better near or far vision, accordingly to your needs.

ProperFocus is unisex, stylish and can be wored be people of any age. They are also waterproof and scratch-resistant, so you can wear them even while working out or running.

✅ Adjustable Dual Lense Technology 

✅ Flexible Frame that Compliments Your Face

✅ High-quality Materials

✅ Unisex and for All Ages

✅ Anti-Scratch Design

Why should I choose ProperFocus instead of a regular pair of eyeglasses?

The key to its success is its customizability. After buying ProperFocus you won’t have to buy new glasses because of a new prescription.

By adjusting the lenses, you actually adjust the magnification accordingly to your needs. This can’t happen with a regular pair of glasses. You would have to go again to the optometrist and buy a new pair or at least change your lenses – which can be very expensive.

Another feature that makes ProperFocus so great, is that you won’t have to switch between different pairs of glasses.

If you are 40+, you’re probably having trouble reading or using your smartphone. But you might also have trouble seeing things from a distance or watching TV. 

With ProperFocus, you can have crystal clear vision all the time just by adjusting the lenses. That will not only make you feel more comfortable but will also save you a ton of money!

If you can get your hands on these - DO IT NOW

ProperFocus is selling really fast. If you can get your hands on one — do it. 

We were placed on a 2-week waiting list as it was almost always sold out. When we made the purchase, it was delivered to us within 2-3 days. Super fast shipping.

Last time we checked, they were running up to a 50% DISCOUNT + FREE Shipping (Availability Limited) to celebrate their soft launch. Please try it and let us know about your experience.

If you like being ripped off by purchasing new glasses again and again, stop reading here. If you’re looking for a better and way more affordable option then claim your 50% discount by clicking here.

Check Availability >>>

ProperFocus are only sold ONLY through the official website and not through Amazon, AliExpress or Ebay. 

8,145 Reviews

"Hack" Your Eyesight with ProperFocus™

Check Availability

 5/5

Finally, a single pair of eyeglasses that does everything I need! I was fed up with using two different pairs. When I forgot to take my second pair with me, I couldn’t even use my phone! With ProperFocus is like i’m seeing in HD!

 5/5

Perfect for people in their 50s. I love the adjustable design. I can cook and watch the tv at the same time. Totally recommend it!

 5/5

THESE GLASSES ARE AMAZING. MY SON BOUGHT THEM FOR ME. I NEVER LIKED WEARING GLASSES BUT THESE ARE VERY LIGHTWEIGHT AND STYLISH. THEY LOOK SO COOL. PEOPLE ASK ME WHERE I GOT THEM. THEY LOVE THE ADJUSTABLE LENSES.
